sentences.en: a football player who was washed out; an officer candidate who washed out after one month.
sentences.cn: 被罚下场的足球队员；一月后被免职的候选官员

sentences.en: a lot of them had washed out of pilot training.
sentences.cn: 他们中有许多人已经被淘汰出飞行训练了。

sentences.en: bacon and eggs &B{washed down with} a cup of tea.
sentences.cn: 就着一杯茶吃下去的熏肉和鸡蛋。

sentences.en: By evening, I was washed out from overwork.
sentences.cn: 到了傍晚，我被过多的工作累得精疲力尽

sentences.en: color that had been washed out by bleach.
sentences.cn: 因水洗而渐褪的颜色

sentences.en: Don't worry: this project will come out in the wash.
sentences.cn: 不要着急：这项工程会有好结果的

sentences.en: He headed to the bathroom to wash up.
sentences.cn: 他走进洗手间去洗漱。

sentences.en: he's not happy but he assures me &B{it'll all come out in the wash}.
sentences.cn: 他不高兴，但他向我保证这件事会得到圆满解决的。

sentences.en: I don't have time to wash a blouse out every night.
sentences.cn: 我没有时间每天晚上都洗一下上衣。

sentences.en: I’ll just have a quick wash before we go out.
sentences.cn: 我很快洗个澡，然后我们就出门。

sentences.en: It’s your turn to wash the dishes.
sentences.cn: 该轮到你洗碗碟了。

sentences.en: Set on a cool wash and finish with a short spin.
sentences.cn: 设定用凉水洗衣，最后短时脱水。

sentences.en: She's all washed up as an editor.
sentences.cn: 她做编辑工作累得精疲力竭

sentences.en: That coat could do with a wash.
sentences.cn: 那件外套要洗一下了.

sentences.en: The colours gently fade each time you wash the shirt.
sentences.cn: 衬衣每洗一次都会褪点色。

sentences.en: The prisoner started to wash down the walls of his cell.
sentences.cn: 囚犯开始冲洗各自囚室的墙壁。

sentences.en: The real reasons for her resignation will come out in the wash.
sentences.cn: 她辞职的真正原因终究会真相大白的

sentences.en: The river rose and washed out the dam. The road has washed out five miles down the mountain.
sentences.cn: 河水陡涨，冲垮了大坝。山下的路被冲坏的有五英里

sentences.en: the social services washed their hands of his daughter.
sentences.cn: 社会福利机构不再承管他女儿的事。

sentences.en: their match against Australia was washed out.
sentences.cn: 他们跟澳大利亚队的比赛因下雨而延期进行。

sentences.en: This shirt needs washing.
sentences.cn: 这件衬衫该洗洗了。

sentences.en: This will all come out in the wash—I promise you.
sentences.cn: 一切终会真相大白的——我向你保证。

sentences.en: Those jeans need a good wash (= a thorough wash ).
sentences.cn: 那条牛仔裤要好好洗一洗了。

sentences.en: wash down the walls.
sentences.cn: 彻底清洗墙壁

sentences.en: Wash the feet, underarms and body surface using a soap.
sentences.cn: 用肥皂洗洗脚、腋下及全身。

sentences.en: Wash the lentils under cold running water.
sentences.cn: 用流动的凉水冲洗小扁豆。

sentences.en: Wash the rice in cold water until the water runs clear.
sentences.cn: 用凉水冲洗大米，直到水变清为止。

sentences.en: Wash them in cold water to remove all traces of sand.
sentences.cn: 用冷水冲洗它们以清除所有的沙子。

sentences.en: Wash your face thoroughly with a mild soap and warm water.
sentences.cn: 用刺激性不强的肥皂和热水把脸彻底洗干净。

sentences.en: Wash your hands after using the toilet.
sentences.cn: 便后要洗手。

sentences.en: Wash your hands thoroughly with hot soapy water before handling any food.
sentences.cn: 在拿吃的之前，用热肥皂水把手好好地洗干净。

sentences.en: washed the cake down with coffee.
sentences.cn: 用咖啡把蛋糕冲下肚去

sentences.en: With permanent tints, the result won't wash out.
sentences.cn: 用的是永久性的涂料，洗不掉。

sentences.en: Your jeans are in the wash.
sentences.cn: 你的牛仔裤还在洗着呢。

words.tran_cn: 水分多的；淡的；多水的；无力的
洗涤；洗涤剂；要洗的衣物
洗涤；洗的衣服；化妆水；冲积物

phrases.phrase: come out in the wash&I{【俚语】}

phrases.tran_cn: （衣服、床单或类似之物）待洗的；正在洗的
吞下，咽下：吃下（如食物）后再喝某种液体

phrases.phrase: wash one's dirty linen (或 laundry) in public

phrases.tran_cn: (北美)（因没有达到要求）（遭）淘汰
[口语](论点等)站不住脚，没说服力，经不起检验

trans.tran_cn: 洗（涤），清洗，洗刷，浪花，（颜色、光线等的）薄层
trans.tran_en: an act of cleaning something using soap and water
to clean something using water and a type of soap
to clean something using water and a type of soap

trans.tran_cn: 洗（涤），洗澡/脸/手，耐洗，冲刷，(情感)强烈冲击，令人信服
trans.tran_en: to clean something using water and a type of soap
